sentence.Network_en: To produce or reproduce ( an object ) by electrodeposition on a mold.
sentence.Network_cn: 电铸用电淀积方法在一模子上制作或重制 ( 一个物品 )

sentence.Network_en: The recent development of Cr deposition, especially hexavalent chromium electrodeposition was introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了近年来电镀铬, 特别是六价铬电镀的新发展.

sentence.Network_en: To coat or cover with a thin layer of metal by electrodeposition.
sentence.Network_cn: 用涂料,金属等的稀少外层覆盖.
